Title: Prohibits off-track betting corporation vehicles from being used as take-home vehicles
Summary: Prohibits off-track betting corporation vehicles from being used as take-home vehicles by board members, officers, employees, contractors, subcontractors, consultants, or agents of such corporation or by certain family members of such individuals; provides an exception therefor.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting off-track betting corporation vehicles from being used as take-home vehicles
